about_the_game:
Embark on an epic journey into a whimsical world of strategy and mayhem with "Tiny Tanks"! Engage in thrilling turn-based battles where cunning tactics and strategic weapon choices are key to victory.

Arm yourself with an arsenal of unique weapons, each with its own special abilities and upgrade paths. From explosive boulders to icy blasts, rain down havoc upon your foes and dominate the battlefield.

Unleash your creativity as you navigate through dynamically destructible environments, using the terrain to your advantage and outmaneuvering your opponents at every turn. But beware, as every action has consequences, and the battlefield is ever-changing.

Embark on an epic journey into a whimsical world of strategy and mayhem with "Tiny Tanks"! Engage in thrilling turn-based battles where cunning tactics and strategic weapon choices are key to victory.

Arm yourself with an arsenal of unique weapons, each with its own special abilities and upgrade paths. From explosive boulders to icy blasts, rain down havoc upon your foes and dominate the battlefield.

Unleash your creativity as you navigate through dynamically destructible environments, using the terrain to your advantage and outmaneuvering your opponents at every turn. But beware, as every action has consequences, and the battlefield is ever-changing.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Only
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Tiny Tanks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB Video Memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: "Tiny Tanks" delivers thrilling turn-based battles where strategy reigns supreme. Choose from a variety of unique weapons, and engage in dynamic battles across destructible environments. With both story and survival modes, it's time to conquer the battlefield and become the ultimate tank commander!
